Author: Jono Lewis
Summary: This tool is intended to allow Azure users to remove existing Resource Groups, Azure Extensions, Virtual Machines, Load Balancers, VNets and Network Security Groups..\AZRM-RemoveResource.ps1 -RemoveObject extension -AzExtConfig diag -VMName suse1001 -rg resx.\AZRM-RemoveResource
Title: Azure PowerShell Resource Management Removal Tool
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Windows Azure PowerShell, Azure Resource Manager
